title: 150: LISTEN TO YOUR HEART: FINALE + Discussing Hannah Brown
itunes:title: 150: LISTEN TO YOUR HEART: FINALE + Discussing Hannah Brown
description:
The Broads begin the episode discussing the disappointing events this week in Bachelor Nation (0:00 - 28:30). They then catch up on a few more Bach related topics before diving into The Snoozefest aka The Finale of Listen To Your Heart. They express all their feels over the first couple to go, chat about the “Fantasy Suites, discuss the final performances, make theories about where the couples are at now, and laugh over a thousand tangents (because c’mon the epsiode was pretty zzzz)! 
Thank you for joining us on this Listen To Your Heart journey, Broads. It’s had its ups and its downs - but you have always been our UP. Love you all. Join us as we begin to recap the new series “The Bachelor: The Greatest Seasons - Ever!” starting June 8th! Until then we have great episodes and guests for you every Tuesday and Thursday! 
***Stay Tuned: We will be joined by a very special LTYH related guest on THURSDAY MAY 21! 
INSTAGRAM:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads
Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom 
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
